mainText:
I can say I was privilaged to have witnessed one of the greatest come backs in history. Apple could never have recoverred from failure if Steve wouldn't have been back to save it.
Yes, this message is sent from my iPad, and when my 8 month old son looks at
 in the future I will feel obliged to tell him this was the most amazing and
 inovative gadget of my time, and its creator was Mr. Steve Jobs, probably the most visionary man in the technology world so far.
Rest in Peace Mr. Jobs, know that the world owes you a great deal.
author: Anonymous
